data.name: Pussies Wrestling Dicks
data.detailed_description:
In Pussies Wrestling Dicks, you play as one of a group of girls who have taken up the sport of punching guys in the genitals until they ejaculate. This unique puzzle game will test your wits as you unravel sexy images of girls and guys fighting each other.

The girls have endlessly trained their pelvic muscles to crush any penis that dares to step in the ring with them. Only the strongest, hardest cocks will be able to take the punishment these pussies can dish out.

Are you up for the challenge?

Features:

- Over 50 different levels to test your skills.
- Puzzles get harder the further you get.
- Beautiful art and sexy images.
- Lots of sweaty muscles and dick slapping.

The gameplay is a classic memory game where you match cards with the same image. But instead of cute animals or landmarks, you'll be matching cards with pictures of guys getting their dicks slapped by girls. And instead of traditional punishment for losing, you'll be rewarded with a hot and steamy scene of the girl you're playing as orgasming from all the dick slapping.

data.short_description: Pussies Wrestling Dicks is a fighting game where girls punch guys so hard they cum all over the fighting ring.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity. The game also contains many fighting scenes with some amount of blood and light injuries. All sexual acts are consensual.
